SEARCH
Package com.cloudhopper.mc.generator.generic

Klasse GenericDeploymentConfigGenerator

java.lang.Object
com.cloudhopper.mc.generator.generic.GenericDeploymentConfigGenerator
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
com.cloudhopper.mc.generator.api.spi.DeploymentConfigGenerator
public class GenericDeploymentConfigGenerator extends Object implements com.cloudhopper.mc.generator.api.spi.DeploymentConfigGenerator
A default implementation of DeploymentConfigGenerator that uses JSON-based configuration and Freemarker templates to generate deployment files.

This generator is designed for template-based backends (e.g. Terraform, CloudFormation, etc.) and requires no custom Java logic from integrators beyond registering templates via annotations.

The generator:

  • Loads generator configuration from a JSON file named <generatorId>-templates.json
  • Renders templates grouped by GenerationPhase
  • Provides base and API-specific data models to templates
  • Supports Java file generation as well as static file generation

Usage

To use this generator, implement a class annotated with TemplateRegistration: 

 @TemplateRegistration(
     generatorId = "aws-terraform-java21",
     templates = {
         @Template(
             phase = GenerationPhase.FUNCTION,
             templateName = "function",
             outputFileExtension = "tf",
             outputSubDirectory = "deployment/aws",
             description = "Main Lambda function resource"
         )
     }
 )
 public class AwsTemplateRegistration { }
The corresponding template files must be available in: /templates/<generatorId>/function.ftl

This class is loaded reflectively by the Cloudhopper annotation processor if no custom DeploymentConfigGenerator is provided.
